title: High Educational Attainment Among Adults
description: In 2022, 61.09% of Montenegro's population aged 25 and above had attained at least a Bachelor's degree, with 58.19% of females and 65.53% of males achieving this level of education.

title: Minimal Industrial Design Applications
description: In 2020, Montenegro recorded only 1 resident industrial design application, indicating a low level of industrial design activity.

title: Low Measles Immunization Rate
description: As of 2023, only 24% of children aged 12-23 months in Montenegro were immunized against measles, highlighting a significant public health challenge.

title: Negligible Arms Exports
description: In 2017, Montenegro's arms exports were valued at $1,000,000, reflecting a minimal contribution to the global arms trade.

title: Minimal Tariff Peaks on Manufactured Products
description: In 2022, only 0.00135% of Montenegro's tariff lines for manufactured products had international peaks, indicating a low level of trade protectionism.

title: Low New Displacement Due to Disasters
description: In 2023, Montenegro reported only 1 new case of internal displacement due to disasters, suggesting effective disaster management strategies.
